Question.Subject: What can I do to my internet so American websites don't know I'm outside America so I can watch their shows?
Question.ChosenAnswer: there are many websites out there they display this shows online but i could reckonment using a IP router so that it appears ur in the us but ur not but i casues extremly slow internet u can get free ones that can be switched off when ur not watching them but if you want more details let me know i do this alot my self

Answer.Content: You are tracked by your IP address. My own wife appears in the current Bank of America commercial but I'm in London so I can't see it

there are many websites out there they display this shows online but i could reckonment using a IP router so that it appears ur in the us but ur not but i casues extremly slow internet u can get free ones that can be switched off when ur not watching them but if you want more details let me know i do this alot my self
